view

Class ViewFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • view.ViewFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, IView

    public class ViewFacade
extends Observable
implements IView, Runnable

    The Class ViewFacade provides a facade of the View component.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sulyven, Enzo, Abdel, Arthur and Ugo group
